PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-09942003-06-18,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActCooperative Credit Associations Act
PrecisEnactment of the EXEMPTION FROM APPROVAL FOR CERTAIN INVESTMENTS IN INTRAGROUP SERVICE ENTITIES (COOPERATIVE CREDIT ASSOCIATIONS) REGULATIONS which clarify that cooperative credit associations may, without applying for the Superintendent's or the Minister's approval, invest in entities solely engaged in lending exclusively to members of their own group.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0243 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
